q: As a result, Egypt's economy, which depends heavily on tourism, is taking a toll. It is estimated that one million tourists have fled Cairo since the protests began on Jan. 25. All the people who live around here, they depend on the lives of tourists, Zahi Hawass said.`` If there is no tourism, there is no food for the people.''

'' he said.`` Larry Page , Sergey Brin and I have worked exceptionally closely together for over a decade- and we anticipate working together for a long time to come.'' Larry Page praised Eric Schmidt for an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade.`` There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, he said.`` Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him. His advice and efforts will be invaluable to me as I start in this new role,'' he said

Bush in 2012.`` We seriously considered it, which for a small-town boy from Southern Indiana is a very humbling thing to do,'' Mike Pence said Thursday. But at the end of the day, we ultimately believed that where our little family is led is somewhere in the service of the people of Indiana in the days ahead. I've learned in decisions like these to follow my heart. My heart is in Indiana.
